title: Couldn't enlist in Ocean Week. Bug?
body: Clicked "Enlist Now" on the event page and nothing happened. Too late or bug?

replies.body:
It's not too late! There's three days left!

What are you seeing when you try to sign up? 

If you're not seeing any visible errors, can you look in the Javascript console for your browser and let us know if any errors are showing up there?

If you're not sure where to find that, here's the shortcuts for most of the browsers:
**Chrome: Ctrl+Shift+J
Firefox: Ctrl+Shift+K
Internet Explorer: F12, then click Console**

I found these when I arrived at the event page (through client):

Failed to load resource:  http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/favicon.ico 
the server responded with a status of 403 (Forbidden)

http://apollo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/apollo/cors/index.html?xdm_e=http%3A%2F%2Fpromo.oce.leagueoflegends.com&xdm_c=default8635&xdm_p=1 Failed to load resource: the server responded with a status of 404 (Not Found)

When I clicked on "Enlist Now" that pops up, got these:

XMLHttpRequest cannot load http://ocean-week-2016-api-lb-1384813257.us-west-2.elb.amazonaws.com/players. Response to preflight request doesn't pass access control check: No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header is present on the requested resource. Origin 'http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com' is therefore not allowed access.
ping-0.1.239.min.js:7 

GET https://ekg.riotgames.com/m.gif?d=%7B%22messageType%22%3A%22web_ping%22%2C%â€¦%20button%23enlist.btn.btn-primary%22%2C%22timestamp%22%3A1453992872630%7D net::ERR_SSL_PROTOCOL_ERROR

Thank you for your help.

EDIT: In Javascript Console. Using Chrome.

Thanks for all the detail - I'll pass this along to some guys and see if we can figure out the issue!

While we're investigating, a few things that have helped with other players having issues with enlisting that could be worth trying below:

 * Trying a different browser 
 * [Flushing your local DNS caching](https://www.whatsmydns.net/flush-dns.html)
 * Trying public DNS instead of your ISP DNS.
Hello, it has been fixed for me. I've joined the fight. Thanks.
Tried all 3, still not working. Thanks though.
